content: If you try to kill -9 Haar's programs, it backfires.
CNN was originally created as the "Haar Network" to update Daeins with on-the-spot ass kicking in real-time.
Haar does not own a house. He flys into random houses and people move.
Haar doesn't need an account. He just logs in.
The easiest way to determine Haar's age is to cut him in half and count the rings.
Ghosts are actually caused by Haar killing people faster than Death can process them.
Haar can write to an output stream.
Haar once rode a bull, and nine months later it had a calf.
Haar plays racquetball with a waffle iron and a bowling ball.
